migrations.description: Split global configuration files into individual project.json files. This migration has been added automatically to the beginning of your migration set to retroactively make them work with the new version of Nx.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Remove root property from project.json files
migrations.name: 14-0-6-remove-root

migrations.description: Add JSON Schema to Nx configuration files
migrations.name: 14-2-0-add-json-schema

migrations.description: Remove default collection from configuration to switch to prompts for collection
migrations.name: 14-2-0-remove-default-collection

migrations.description: Replace all ./ and ../ in outputs with absolute paths
migrations.name: 14-2-0-replace-relative-outputs-with-absolute

migrations.description: Replace targetDependencies with targetDefaults
migrations.name: 14.3.4-create-target-defaults

migrations.description: Replace implicitDependencies with namedInputs + target inputs
migrations.name: 15.0.0-migrate-to-inputs

migrations.description: Prefix outputs with {workspaceRoot}/{projectRoot} if needed
migrations.name: 15.0.0-prefix-outputs

migrations.description: Set project names in project.json files
migrations.name: 15.1.0-set-project-names

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 15.8.2-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Replace @nrwl/tao with nx
migrations.name: 13-9-0-replace-tao-with-nx

migrations.description: Update the decorate-angular-cli script to require nx instead of @nrwl/cli
migrations.name: 13-10-0-update-decorate-cli

migrations.description: Update the tasks runner property to import it from the nx package instead of @nrwl/workspace
migrations.name: 13-10-0-update-tasks-runner

migrations.description: Changes the presets in nx.json to come from the nx package
migrations.name: 14-0-0-change-nx-json-presets

migrations.description: Migrates from @nrwl/workspace:run-script to nx:run-script
migrations.name: 14-0-0-change-npm-script-executor

migrations.description: Explicitly enable sourceAnalysis for all workspaces extending from npm.json or core.json (this was default behavior prior to 14.2)
migrations.name: 14-2-0-enable-source-analysis

migrations.description: Migrates from @nrwl/workspace:run-commands to nx:run-commands
migrations.name: 14-8-0-change-run-commands-executor

migrations.description: Split global configuration files (e.g., workspace.json) into individual project.json files.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Change Cypress e2e and component testing presets to use __filename instead of __dirname and include a devServerTarget for component testing.
migrations.name: update-cypress-configs-preset

migrations.description: Update Cypress if using v10 to support latest component testing features
migrations.name: update-cypress-if-v10

migrations.description: Stop hashing cypress spec files and config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-cypress-inputs

migrations.description: Update to using cy.mount in the commands.ts file instead of importing mount for each component test file
migrations.name: update-cy-mount-usage

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v11. This migration will only update if the workspace is already on v10. https://www.cypress.io/blog/2022/11/04/upcoming-changes-to-component-testing/
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-11

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v12. Cypress 12 contains a handful of breaking changes that might causes tests to start failing that nx cannot directly fix. Read more Cypress 12 changes: https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-12-0.This migration will only run if you are already using Cypress v11.
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-12

migrations.description: Update usages of webpack executors to @nrwl/webpack
